timeline.message: Create SSLEngine instance using host and port
Allow specifying custom trust manager instance to SslContextBuilder

Override hostname verification in PeerAuthorizerTrustManager

Override hostname verification on client-side.
Remove overriding of hostname verification for server-side.

timeline.bodyText: Should this be HostnameValidation to be in line with the config?
timeline.author: vekterli
timeline.diffHunk:

replies.bodyText: The concept is called hostname verification in Java hence the name. I agree this could be renamed to be more in line with config name.
replies.author: bjorncs

replies.bodyText: It makes sense to use the concept that most closely maps to what's used on the underlying platform, so let's stick with verification for now.
replies.author: vekterli
